title: A valuable lesson
body:
Found some [reading material](https://9gag.com/gag/abMqgmv) for people to take a look at. I know it's probably futile to try and teach some of the people here "new tricks", so to say, but I could name more than a few "person b's" here, so yeah...

Have fun with it.

replies.body:
I'm sure we're all guilty of some of them every now and again but defs a great big
